scripts.prepare: concurrently --names='client:install,common:install,server:install' 'cd client && npm i' 'cd common && npm i' 'cd server && npm i'
scripts.start: cd common && npm run build && cd .. && concurrently --kill-others --names='client,server' 'cd client && npm start' 'cd server && npm start'
scripts.clean: rm -rf client/node_modules && rm -rf common/node_modules && rm -rf common/.build && rm -rf server/node_modules
